sentence.Network_en: He was under pressure to resign and was about to be sidelined.
sentence.Network_cn: 他承受着被迫辞职的压力，很快就要被排挤出去了。

sentence.Network_en: It now seems only a matter of time before they resign.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在看来，他们辞职是早晚的事。

sentence.Network_en: I did not have any intimation that he was going to resign.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一点儿都不知道他要辞职。

list.abs: 裸辞（naked resignation），指白领一族还没找好下家就辞职的现象。裸辞的原因多为长期缺乏工作幸福感，或对工作未来的迷失感 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French resigner, from Latin resignare 'unseal, cancel', from re- 'back' + signare 'sign, seal'

entry.def: If you resign from a job or position, you formally announce that you are leaving it.

example.ex: A hospital administrator has resigned over claims he lied to get the job...
example.tran: 一位医院的管理人员辞职了，因为有人指责他为了得到这份工作而撒了谎。

example.ex: Mr Robb resigned his position last month.
example.tran: 罗布先生上个月辞职了。

entry.tran: 屈从;顺从;安于;勉强接受
entry.def: If you resign yourself to an unpleasant situation or fact, you accept it because you realize that you cannot change it.

example.ex: Pat and I resigned ourselves to yet another summer without a boat...
example.tran: 我和帕特在没有船的情况下勉强又凑合了一个夏天。

example.ex: He had resigned himself to watching the European Championships on television.
example.tran: 他只好将就着在电视上看欧洲锦标赛。

means.word_mean: 1. leave (a job, post, post, or position) voluntarily;

sentences.sentence: "She vacated the position when she got pregnant"
"The chairman resigned when he was found to have misappropriated funds"

means.word_mean: 2. give up or retire from a position;

sentences.sentence: "The Secretary fo the Navy will leave office next month"
"The chairman resigned over the financial scandal"

means.word_mean: 3. part with a possession or right;

sentences.sentence: "I am relinquishing my bedroom to the long-term house guest"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =mark,表示"记号,信号,标志"; 2. 签署

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意义的;重大的,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: significance[[n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的]]→adj.有意义的;重大的,重要的
in内部+sign记号,信号,标志+ia状态→内部标志

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
stems_affixes.word_buile: assign派给,分配+ment表名词→n.分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
consign[v.托运,托人看管]+ment表名词→n.托运,寄售
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
designate[v.指明,指出;任命,指派]+ion表名词→designation指定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 旗, 军舰旗, 军旗, 徽章,舰旗[船上表示所属国家的旗帜]
stems_affixes.word_buile: en内部+sign记号,信号,标志→内部标志
resign[v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从]+ation表名词→n.放弃,辞职,反抗
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知
sign记号,信号,标志+ature表名词→记号的东西→签名
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意义,含义;重要性,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: signifi=signify[v.表示,意味;要紧,有重要性]+cance→n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 派给,分配;选定,指定[时间,地点等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强+sign签署→指定
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
de加强+sign记号+ate表动词→指定记号→指定,指明
con共同+sign记号,信号,标志→共同做记号→把……委托给别人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+sign签署→v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使著名, 使显著, 使显眼, 向……发信号
stems_affixes.word_buile: signal信号+ize表动词→发信号
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表示,意味;要紧,有重要性
stems_affixes.word_buile: sign记号,信号,标志+ify……化→用信号表示→象征

Sentence.sentence: She has made up her mind to resign.

sentences.en: He resigned his directorship and left the firm.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了董事职务, 离开了公司。

sentences.en: I resigned myself to a long wait in line.
sentences.cn: 我顺从地在长队中等候。

jushi.english: He intimated that he intended to resign.
Report has it that he will resign.
If Paul resigns, who will get the job?
jushi.chinese: 如果保尔辞职,谁会得到这份差事呢?
